NetSparkleUpdater.​LogWriter
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​ILogger
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​LogWriter

A simple class to handle log information for NetSparkleUpdater.  Make sure to do any setup for this class that you want to do before calling StartLoop on your SparkleUpdater object.

Variables
tag
public static string tag

Tag to show before any log statements

Functions
LogWriter
public LogWriter()

Empty constructor -> sets PrintDiagnosticToConsole to false

LogWriter
public LogWriter(
bool printDiagnosticToConsole
)

LogWriter constructor that takes a bool to determine the value for printDiagnosticToConsole

Parameter
printDiagnosticToConsole
bool

False to print to ; true to print to

Properties
PrintDiagnosticToConsole
public bool PrintDiagnosticToConsole { get; set }

True if this class should print to ; false if this object should print to .  Defaults to false.
